mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_document_history ( file_name, file_url, file_hash, status, create_date, update_date ) VALUES ( #{fileName}, #{fileUrl}, #{fileHash}, #{status}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.select: SELECT id, file_name as fileName, file_url as fileUrl, file_hash as fileHash, status, create_date as createDate, update_date as updateDate FROM tb_document_history WHERE status = 'COMPLETED' ORDER BY create_date DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT id, file_name as fileName, file_url as fileUrl, file_hash as fileHash, status, create_date as createDate, update_date as updateDate FROM tb_document_history WHERE file_hash = #{fileHash} ORDER BY create_date DESC LIMIT 1
